amendment.description: To limit suspicious activity reporting requirements to requests from law enforcement agencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 365, not having 60 votes in opposition to the motion to table, was withdrawn in Senate.
Motion to table amendment SA 365 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 4. Record Vote Number: 83.

Amendment SA 365 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 347. (consideration: CR S3400-3401; text: CR S3400) To limit suspicious activity reporting requirements to requests from law enforcement agencies, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 365 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 4. Record Vote Number: 83.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 365 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 347.
